divs: Sighting DetailsDid anyone happen to see the 4 lights in the sky, around 7:24 PM we looked to the south while walking and seen what appeared to be 4 stars, in the form of a square. I thought Hmm how odd, and they started moving. The top left zooms diagnol down and vanishes, same with the top right. The 3rd one went closer to the other last light, and vanished, making only one, then that one suddenly disappeared.
trends: There have been 73 other sightings in Mesa
There were 3 other sightings in Mesa on or around September 22nd 2012
Summary: 4 UFO lights in the South sky.
